mapper.select: select id, stock_code, stock_name, plate, main_business, niche_business, circulation, instructions, yesterday_gains, start_gains, gains, amplitude, changing_hands, yesterday_amplitude, yesterday_changing_hands, average_Price10, average_Price5, current_Price, create_date, create_by, modifed_date, modifed_by, trend_type, remark from base_bd_up_stock where id = #{id}
